Sentencas: The potential for high-efficiency energy conversion is one of the principal factors driving the development of fuel cell systems.
Titulo: Efficiency enhancement in fuel cells: Multistage oxidation concept

Sentencas: High fuel utilization and high operating voltage are required in order to obtain high efficiency.
Titulo: Efficiency enhancement in fuel cells: Multistage oxidation concept

Sentencas: Analysis shows that the efficiency of a fuel cell system increases by employing multistage fuel oxidation.
Titulo: Efficiency enhancement in fuel cells: Multistage oxidation concept

Sentencas: In addition, the multistage oxidation improves stack reliability by reducing temperature gradients in the stacks.
Titulo: Efficiency enhancement in fuel cells: Multistage oxidation concept

Sentencas: The concept was experimentally tested using single-and two-stage planar solid oxide fuel cell stack arrangements.
Titulo: Efficiency enhancement in fuel cells: Multistage oxidation concept
